data.title: Meet Jason Momoa’s actress girlfriend, Adria Arjona: the Aquaman star’s new flame is the daughter of singer Ricardo Arjona, stars in Hit Man with Glen Powell – and looks just like Eiza González
data.meta_description: After dropping hints at an event last week that he was in a relationship, Aquaman star Jason Momoa has officially confirmed it via Instagram – so what do we know about his new love, Adria Arjona?
data.text:
The happy news comes after Momoa teased viewers in a recent appearance at the 2024 Basingstoke Comic Con, per the source. There, he replied to a question about his love life, stating, “I’m very much in a relationship.” When asked who he’s dating, the 44-year-old responded, “You’ll find out very soon. I’ve been in a relationship for a while.”

Here’s what we know about Jason Momoa’s new girlfriend:

Adria Arjona is a Puerto Rican-Guatemalan actress

The 32-year-old has starred in a number of films and TV shows over the years. Per her IMDB page, these include True Detective, Narcos, Emerald City, Pacific Rim: Uprising, Life of the Party, Triple Frontier, Morbius, and Father of the Bride, to name a few.

She has a famous father

Arjona’s father is the internationally renowned Guatemalan singer and songwriter Ricardo Arjona. In a 2018 interview with People, she talked about how he inspires her. “He motivates me and pushes my limits and makes sure that I’m always growing as an artist,” she said. “He is constantly making me cultivate my head, not just my physicality.”

She was previously married

Before dating Momoa, Arjona was married to a lawyer named Edgardo Canales. They tied the knot in 2020, and attended the Vanity Fair Oscars party together in 2020, but it’s unclear when they split up for good, per People.

She likes to keep moving

Arjona loves to travel. According to Flaunt, she grew up between Central and South America, Mexico City and Miami, before moving to New York City to attend the Lee Strasberg Theatre & Film Institute when she was 18. She told the publication that she spent a lot of time on the road with her father too. “Growing up in that environment taught me that that’s the kind of lifestyle I want to live. I never want to be in one place for too long. I dislike comfort a lot,” she said.

And has a passion for fashion

On Instagram, Arjona showcases her passion for luxury brands. From donning the coveted Prada Galleria bag and Tiffany & Co. necklaces, to attending Loewe and Ralph Lauren shows and wearing show-stopping gowns from Carolina Herrera, it’s clear she has access to some of the best brands in the biz.

How did Adria Arjona and Jason Momoa meet?

According to People, Arjona and Momoa probably met while filming Sweet Girl in November 2019. It was released in 2021.

People think she looks a bit like his ex, Eiza González

The resemblance is uncanny! For years, netizens have been confused between the two, who have even been described as looking like twins by some media. It seems they are friends too, based on reports.

The Dune actor dated González in 2022 after his split from then-wife Lisa Bonet, per People.
